subject: thank you notes (klark)
body:
I'm thankful for the routine. The daily commitments and responsibilities that we have agreed to take on, in order for us to purposely get out of bed each day and do something that contains meaning. I'm thankful for the everyday people that take part in my routine as I take part in theirs. Each of us selfishly aware of our goals, but also, as if understanding each other, operate to not get in the way of each other.  

\- klark (4/5/16). designer.
normalized_markdown:

I'm thankful for the everyday people that take part in my routine as I take part in theirs. Each of us selfishly aware of our goals, but also, as if understanding each other, operate to not get in the way of each other.  

\- klark (4/5/16). designer.
